<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi maso palice v magnetnem polju</string>
            <string language="en">Find the mass of the  current carrying rod in a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie die Masse der aktuellen tragenden 
Stange in einem magnetischem aufzufangen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez la masse de la tige portante actuelle 
dans un champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre a massa da haste carregando atual em um 
campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi la massa dell'asta trasportante corrente in
un campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε τη μάζα της παρούσας φέρνοντας ράβδου σε ένα 
μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encuentre la masa de la barra que lleva actual en
un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Skozi palico teče tok, postavljena je v konstantno zunanje magnetno polje in visi pod stropom.</string>
            <string language="en">A current carrying rod is hanging from the celling and constant external magnetic field is applied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetna sila</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine aktuelle tragende Stange hängt von der 
Zellenentfernung und Konstante, die externe magnetische 
auffangen, wird angewendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une tige portante actuelle pend de la 
décellulation et le champ magnétique externe de constante est 
appliqué.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma haste carregando atual está pendurando do 
celling e o campo magnético externo da constante é aplicado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un asta trasportante corrente sta pendendo dal 
celling ed il campo magnetico esterno di costante è applicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρούσα φέρνοντας ράβδος κρεμά από celling και
το σταθερό εξωτερικό μαγνητικό πεδίο εφαρμόζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una barra que lleva actual está colgando del 
celling y se aplica el campo magnético externo de la constante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza magnética</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
